body: Musette, a leading producer and distributor of leather goods is expanding its team, hiring a Purchasing Manager. We require:- university degree;- good command of Italian and English - strong leadership- good knowledge of Microsoft Office (especially Word and Excel) - excellent problem solving abilities - ability to manage multiple priorities- communication skills;- negotiating skills You will be responsable for: - Providing the procurement support to manufacturing plants - Establishing and maintaining effective supplier relationships - Overseeing the supply chain management  Key benefits: - motivating compensation package - strong carrier opportunities in a fast developing company
title: PURCHASING MANAGER
locations: Verzisori nr.35-38, București, Municipiul București, România
